definition: Xiaoshan district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Reporter: How many shoe industry are there in Hangzhou Xiaoshan District?
sentences.chinese: 現在杭州市蕭山區一共多少家鞋企？

sentences.english: Hangzhou Xiaoshan District, simply suspend the housing mortgage loan business .
sentences.chinese: 杭州蕭山區，只需暫停住房抵押貸款業務。

sentences.english: Data of urban include Xiaoshan and Yuhang district since 2001.
sentences.chinese: 從2001年起市區數據包括蕭山區和餘杭區。

sentences.english: And what's the advantage of craft shoes industry in Xiaoshan District?
sentences.chinese: 蕭山區工業鞋的產業優勢有哪些？
